name: clinic_management_system
description: Clinic Management System for Hyderabad - OPD-first platform with Dermatology focus

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=frontend" "npm run start:dev --workspace=backend" "npm run build --workspace=shared-types -- --watch"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=shared-types && npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=frontend && npm run test --workspace=backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=backend
scripts.dev:minimal: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=frontend" "MINIMAL_BOOT=true npm run start:dev --workspace=backend"

author: Clinic Ops
